column3: In 0.17 branch `encryptwallet` stops the node, which changed in #12493. For that reason the test is adjusted.
nit: seems construction would be marginally better\nhttps://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/memory/weak_ptr/weak_ptr\nhttps://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/memory/weak_ptr/operator%3D
